detail.title: Time Travel Tips from 'Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.'
detail.sub: Traveling back in time is never easy? Let us help by consulting the pros!
detail.author: CHRISTINE DINH
detail.content:
Look, we all know hopping through the decades ain't easy. In fact, who can keep up with all the different rules of time travel.

Luckily, we know a bunch of experts. During the production of Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. Season 7, Marvel.com had the opportunity to consult the cast and showrunners how to remain composure while navigating time travel. Watch what they have to say, learn the Do's and Don't's, and word of advice, it's probably best to avoid the shenanigans of Deke Shaw. We haven't forgotten the events of Season 6, Deke ðŸ‘€.
